welcome_message_body: Welcome to Guimaraes, the charming and historic birthplace of Portugal. Explore the city's medieval streets, rich history, and vibrant culture, and enjoy every moment of your visit here.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braga Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vila Real Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free by selecting 'VR Airport Wifi' and accepting the terms and conditions.
